people.name: Dr. Rajdeep Chatterjee
people.bio: Rajdeep Chatterjee received his Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering from The University of Burdwan in 2008. He completed both his Master of Technology and Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from KIIT Deemed to be University in 2011 and 2020, respectively. He received MHRD (Govt. of India) scholarship in his masters for possessing All India Rank 1410 in GATE-2008. He started his professional career as Project Linked Person at Machine Intelligence Unit, Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata. He is currently working as an Assistant Professor at School of Computer Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, India. Besides, he is associated as an expert member in the Cognitive Systems and Cybernetics Research Lab., MIU, ISI Kolkata, India. He is also one of the founding members of the international conference series on Computational Intelligence & Networks (http://www.cineconf.org). He has published research articles in many reputed international conferences and journals. He is a regular reviewer of various reputed journals such as Medical & Biological Eng. & Computing (SCI-E, IF: 2.602), IEEE Transactions on Biomedical Engineering (SCI-E, IF: 4.538), IEEE Journal of Biomedical and Health Informatics (SCI-E, IF: 5.223), Computers in Biology and Medicine (SCI-E, IF: 4.589), IEEE Transactions on Emerging Topics in Computational Intelligence (Scopus, IF: 8.28), Evolutionary Intelligence (Scopus, DBLP), etc. His research areas include Brain-Computer Interface, Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Computer Vision.

people.name: Tathagata Bandyopadhyay
people.bio: Tathagata Bandyopadhyay is currently pursuing his MSc. in Informatics at Technical University of Munich, Germany with specialization in Computer Vision, Deep Learning and Scientific Computing. Before , he worked as a software engineer at Dell Technologies where he was responsible for developing a market competition based dynamic pricing model using statistics and machine learning algorithms. He received his B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering in 2017 from KIIT University, India with Founder's Gold Medal for all round performance  across all programs of the university. His research interest includes audio source separation, audio retrieval, Brain Computer Interface (BCI) with EEG Signals, Bio-Medical Image processing and Computer Vision applications. He has seven publications as listed below.

people.name: Anish Pathak
people.bio: Anish Pathak is a software engineer with 2+ years of work experience. He is highly motivated by research applications with a real-world impact and is currently aspiring to pursue a master's in Computer Science to further his knowledge.

people.name: Ankita Chatterjee
people.bio: Ankita Chatterjee received the Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering from W.B.U.T, India and Master of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering from KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, India. Currently, she is working as a Junior Research Fellow (JRF) at IIT Bhubaneswar, India. Her research interests include Brain-Computer Interface, Machine Learning, Computer Vision and Deep Learning.

people.name: Mahendra Kumar Gourisaria
people.bio: Mahendra Kumar Gourisaria is presently working as an Assistant Professor in the School of Computer Engineering at KIIT University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha. He has received his Master degree in Computer Application from Indira Gandhi National Open University, New Delhi and M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from Biju Patnaik University of Technology - Rourkela. He is pursuing his Ph.D. from KIIT Deemed to be University. He has an experience of more than 18 years in academia and 7 years in research. He has published more than 20 research papers in different international journals and conferences of repute. He has also served as the organizing committees members of various conferences and workshop. His area of research includes Cloud Computing, Data Mining, Soft Computing and Internet and Web Technology. He is a member of IAENG, UACEE and life member of ISTE, CSI and ISCA.

people.name: Soham Roy
people.position: MSc in Data Science and AI at Saarland University
people.bio: I belong from kolkata and have completed my bachelors from Kiit in computer science and engineering. post bachelors i have worked in the software engineering and aiml domain in the industry  for around 3.5  years. Alongside that i have also participated in many research activities . Currently i am doing my Msc studies at Saarland university from saarbrucken in data science and ai. My current research interests lies in the computer vision domain.

people.name: Atri Biswas
people.bio: Atri Biswas is a B.Tech graduate from Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology. He has done his Major Project in AI/ML field and has found a solution for Interview process automation for which he and his team has been awarded BEST PAPER AWARD from ICMIDAS (International Conference on Machine Intelligence and Data Science). He has done his internship from East Experts where he worked on an ERP project based on developing an E-Commerce website singlehandedly. Further, he is thorough in a number of coding languages such as Python, Golang, R and query languages such as SQL and ORACLE. His communication is top notch and he is a team player and a kind yet logical person.

people.name: Akshita Sah
people.position: B.Tech. Computer Science at KIIT University
people.bio: Hi, I am Akshita Sah. Exploring Technology is my passion. I am an enthusiastic and hardworking person, willing to learn new things and work with others to explore different fields and contribute towards them. Currently, I am in the sophomore year of my college. I have always been interested in programming. I love to participate in contests and competitions to enhance my skills. I love to help others and motivate others as well so that everyone strives to work hard and reach their goals.

people.name: Saptarshi Mazumdar
people.position: Associate Software Developer I at HighRadius
people.bio: Saptarshi Mazumdar is an associate software engineer at Highradius Corporation. His major research area lies in the intersection of Computer Science, Digital Signal Processing and Machine Learning. Some of his research projects include brain computer interfacing with EEG signal processing, Speech recognition and audio understanding. Aditionally, he is an expert in Full-Stack Web development with System integration and System Deployment.

people.name: Anjan Chowdhury
people.bio: Anjan Chowdhury is currrently a SRF at Center for Soft Computing Research, Indian Statistical Institute Kolkata. Before that he earned B.E in computer science from  IIEST, Shibpur and M.Tech in the same field from IIT Bombay. Some of his research interest includes machine learning, complex networks, brain computer interfacing using EEG and fMRI signals and so on.

people.name: Rudrashish Das
people.position: B.Tech, Computer Science at KIIT University
people.bio: Hey, I am Rudrashish Das, a computer science engineer in making. I am a person who is always learning new skills, technologies and ways to communicate better with my team. What drives me is the desire to face the challenge of solving unsolved problems. Reach out to rudrashishdas0@gmail.com to connect.

people.name: Gyanig Kumar
people.position: Research Intern at IISc | Computer Vision | Algorithms
people.bio: Gyanig Kumar is currently interning at IISc Bangalore as a Research Intern under Prof. Pradipta Biswas at I3D Labs. He is pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science and Systems Engineering from KIIT University. At a young age, he was awarded the Innovation Award for School Children by C.S.I.R India for his IoT project on two-wheeler vehicle safety. He has working knowledge of Robotics and pursuing an interest in computer vision applications, Human-Computer Interactions and Deep learning research.

people.name: Dr. Dipak Kumar Mohanty
people.bio: Dr. Dipak Kumar Mohanty has 15 years of experience in teaching Computer Science and Mathematics Subjects meant for B.Tech and M.Tech. Students. He completed his MSc. MCA, and  M.Tech in Computer Science from Utkal University Bhubaneswar, Odisha in 2003, 2007, and 2010 respectively. He obtained Ph.D degree in Stochastic Programming using Soft Computing Techniques from IIT Kharagpur, India in 2020. His research area includes Stochastic Programming, Soft Computing, Mullti-criteraia Decision Making, Machine Learning, and Data Science. Now he is working as an Assistant Professor in School of Computer Engineering, KIIT University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha.

people.name: Tanmay Goyal
people.bio: Tanmay Goyal is a technocrat turned serial entrepreneur who strives to digitize modern businesses with innovation in the media, branding, web, and digital marketing landscape. He is the Co-founder of HashBUGS Solutions Private Limited, one of the leading Branding, Marketing, and Digital Transformation companies. He plays crucial leadership roles in a range of functions from technology management, marketing, design, and development to business development. He received his Bachelor of Business Administration from Amity Global Business School Bangalore, India.

people.name: Riju Mukherjee
people.bio: I am a Machine Learning Engineer with 3 + years of experience in applied machine learning and data science. My experience spans domains like Forecasting, Recommendation, and Computer vision. I have worked with both structured and unstructured data, in ML and DL projects in teams and as an individual contributor.  I have published one research paper as I have a strong inclination toward research in AI. My long-term goal is to build improved AI algorithms by forwarding the field of overlap between Neuroscience and AI. 'A Thousand Brains' is my recent favorite. Please visit www.rijumukherjee.com to know more about me.

people.name: Aditya Agrawal
people.bio: I am a research scholar working in the field of Compilers in IIT Madras. I have work experience in Data Science and Machine Learning and would love to contribute to the research fraternity.

people.name: Subhomoy Roy Choudhury
people.bio: I am a final year engineering student in the field of electronics and communication. I am also a software developer intern at SBNRI. I am good in python , Django Framework for backend and Webapp development and also in machine learning and deep learning.

people.name: Arohan Ajit
people.bio: Hi, I am young professional looking to build my research profile. I graduated from KIIT in 2021. Have worked with computer vision and CNNs. Did some projects and a conference paper.

people.name: Nimisha Goyal
people.bio: Nimisha Goyal, a dynamic marketing and management professional, found her calling in content writing, lifestyle, and social media marketing early in her career. She is the Co-founder of HashBUGS Solutions Private Limited, one of the leading Branding, Marketing, and Digital Transformation companies. She is the force behind HashBUGS's biggest strengths: exceptional client relations and creative innovation. She is a perfectionist, always on the lookout for improvement. She received her Bachelor of Commerce from Delhi University.

people.name: Aditya Manglik
people.bio: Aditya Manglik is a graduate student in machine learning and computer engineering at ETH Zurich, Switzerland. He completed his Bachelor’s in Engineering (Hons) in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Birla Institute of Technology and Sciences, Pilani, Rajasthan, India. His research interests include machine learning, and design and critical analysis of high-performance computing (HPC) systems.

people.name: Umar Masud
people.bio: I am a pre-final year undergrad at JMI University, New Delhi. My interest is in research in the field of ML/AI and Computer Vision. I have applied knowledge of Image Processing, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning, with hands-on practice in various image-related tasks in Computer Vision. I keep reading multiple relevant pieces of literature and try to implement them in code. I also have a basic to intermediate knowledge of web development technologies. Apart from exploring the latest research and technology developments, I can be found consuming content about innovation, ideas, entrepreneurship, start-ups, finance, and alike. A keen interest in the start-up ecosystem.
